channel.title: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi59.tinypic.com/ftkcq9.jpg[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u114/epicurus/247_zps63e6388c.png[/img][/center] [center]Forums - [url=http://www.epicurus-ps.com]www.epicurus-ps.com[/url][/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/35iad6o.jpg[/img] - [url=http://www.youtube.com/EpicurusPS]www.youtube.com/EpicurusPS[/url][/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/24eb96h.jpg[/img] - [url=http://www.twitter.com/EpicurusPS]www.twitter.com/EpicurusPS[/url][/center] [center] [/center]
[center]Download client - [url=http://www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip]www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip[/url][/center] [center] [/center] [center]Webclient - [url=http://www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html]www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html[/url][/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u114/epicurus/instantly_zps5d47d9e9.png[/img][/center] [center]Download our files once, and never wait to download them again! A small one-time download is all you need to get going with Epicurus.[/center] [center]Epicurus utilises its own patching system and class loader which means all updates are pushed straight to your computer and you are not required to re-download manually. Epicurus also offers its own updater which will make sure you have the most up-to-date version of our loader.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u114/epicurus/features_zps905e26a5.png[/img][/center]
[ul][*]Grand exchange [*]Fullscreen and resizable client [*]Decent banking [*]Multiple types of gambling [*]Player abilities, i.e bonds (additions to your account to enhance your character) [*]Weekly lottery [*]Party room [*]Tasks & Achievements [*]Quests [*]In-game and forum leaderboards for all types of players [*]A wide range of custom bosses with unique abilities [*]A strong combat base [*]Many bosses with unique abilities which require strategic play [*]Client pasting, screenshotting, clickable links [*]Magic bonus damage from potions and equipment working correctly [*]Defence in combat works better [*]Decent combat formula [*]Fast and reliable switching with reduced item drag [*]All skills working [*]Duo slayer [*]Full version of barrows [*]Multiple areas and islands players can visit [*]Account modes [*]Player kits; Save and load specific inventories and equipment to quickly return to your desired task [*]Custom teleports; Save your custom locations and teleport to nearly anywhere in the world! [*]Boss instances solo, or in a team [*]Improved npc AI [*]NPC prayers and prayer cycling [*]Both prayer books working, with added prayers Augury and Rigour [*]Good entity->entity following [*]Vengance orb that displays your vengeance timer [*]Advanced anti-cheat system which ensures your experience with us will be enjoyed! [*]Account Guardian, protects your account from devices that are unknown. [*]Server->Player emailing, to ensure you are kept up-to-date with the latest server and account information.[/ul]
And much more!
[center]Here at Epicurus we do not exaggerate our content in order to maximise our publicity. Many servers who advertise "flawless" this and "perfect" that cannot actually provide such things. We do not believe in these terms in order to explain rsps content as we believe there is always room for improvement no matter what. [/center]
Media: [spoiler]
[center][b]Combat[/b][/center] [center][i]Switching[/i][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/40cfa336810b03f29d7df2e78312dbe4.gif[/img][/center] [center][b]Player Bonds[/b][/center] [center]Bonds are items that players can trade, that are sold in the store which give your player new abilities for a certain period of time. These abilities are fully automated and are extremely easy to operate.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/72b774f1fe274ecd4a1510c2dad2762b.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/37c0d9997bcab0aff969ffb7a8de3bbe.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Duo Activities[/b][/center] [center]Duo slayer is a co-operative and fun way to do a slayer socially and efficiently. Both players receive points/xp and a bonus for completing a task together.[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/7efdedcf24b9a248398cd9db11d05d10.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Account modes[/b][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/10fd2323a49215f8cc2c493d4e90d852.png[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center]Which one will you choose?[/center] [center]Iron Man Mode:[/center] [center]Your account is restricted to trading just like in the official Runescape game. This mode is for the most hardcore players who love to earn everything by themselves. This mode also comes with obtainable items that is specifically designed for this mode![/center] [center] [/center] [center]Economy mode:[/center] [center]This mode is just the most basic way of playing. You start out on a fresh account with the starter package. This mode has the ability to access areas that other modes cannot![/center] [center] [/center] [center]Pking mode:[/center] [center]Pking mode allows you to obtain a slight advantage over other modes so you can begin playing instantly. With the pking mode you are able to set your own stats![/center]
[center][b]Bossing[/b][/center] [center][i]Wilderness Beasts[/i][/center] [center]Wilderness beasts are powerful bosses throughout the wilderness with several attack styles. They pack a punch, carry good loot and have unique abilities. Can you defeat them?[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/914dbaad8a3de11a5eb2c0041e040c45.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][i][b]Titan[/b][/i][/center] [center]One boss, two forms. A tough boss that requires a good setup and special equipment to kill. Do you have what it takes to defeat him?[/center] [center][i][b]First form[/b][/i][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/e68c94c4ea31928b445a1c472d760b8b.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][i]Second form[/i][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/616a473ec90e25f430bc43f5efb36271.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/f595b729b3c2c717f2d6a7e60360ff52.png[/img][/center] [center]When bosses are killed, analytics are shown to display the dealt damage.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][i]Skele Trio[/i][/center] [center]Three extremely powerful bosses, combined as one. Three different attack styles, the ability to cycle prayers rendering your attacks useless, and an inventory of good loot! Can you defeat them?[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/9f56e0b4f08bf9463fee8933838c73f2.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][i][b]Ice Queen[/b][/i][/center] [center]The Ice Queen is a powerful boss located in the deep wilderness with many abilities. She's tough, uses multiple attack styles and is able to regenerate her health.[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/502e645a38deb7f0a7fccd8cce149e12.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Grand exchange[/b][/center] [center]A fully working grand exchange with the ability to search, sell, buy and collect from other players regardless of whether they're offline or online.[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/d6964782fae2435fd456ea5fc0f9ab3e.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/730c40f1b2ef4448147ab7077e568267.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Banking[/b][/center] [center]Full banking including item dragging, searching and item inserting.[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/0cd274420253e8d97f765251944f8c06.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Player kits[/b][/center] [center]Players are able to save and load their custom kits. This saves time and is extremely helpful when pking or pvming.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][i]Saving[/i][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/00051b3a0a84001f230cd181097242eb.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][i]Loading[/i][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/a77cf8884dfcae1e27669aa504f93ab2.gif[/img][/center] [center][b]Boss instancing[/b][/center] [center]Boss instances allow users to boss either solo, or as a team without interruption. Players are teleported to their own boss to which no one else can attack or have access to. All players can be managed through the interface.[/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/c510dcc15f37e6fdeaf41737c6f24c6f.gif[/img] [/center] [center][b]Additional orbs[/b][/center] [center]An orb has been added under the prayer orb to display the player's vengeance timer in real-time so you know exactly when you can re-cast your spell! More to come.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/2a9ed69543ca089684ae4c561d5c3684.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Pets[/b][/center] [center]A pet system that allows players to buy their own pets from a huge range that are available. These pets need feeding in order to grow and to be able to help you in combat! Each pet carries its own unique ability.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/51454bdcb0936916a509152309852e8e.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Account Guardian[/b][/center] [center]Epicurus utilises a custom account guardian which protects your account 99.9%. Your account will be completely secure once set and the guardian uses a range of different protection methods to ensure your account is safe, The account guardian will also notify you by email if an account breach is made, or even a low level bruteforce.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/acf544ff16626f75da9173fe07b9b844.gif[/img][/center] [center] [/center] [center][b]Duelling[/b][/center] [center]Duelling has had many fixes and additions. One of the features include loading previous selected rules. The rules of your previous stake, or favourite rule combinations are saved and players have the ability to load them on the interface to save time.[/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/bfbb3cfbbf7fac4b5378c6de826c2414.gif[/img][/center] [center][/spoiler] [center] [/center] [center]Download client - [url=http://www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip]www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip[/url][/center] [center]Webclient - [url=http://www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html]www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html[/url][/center] [center] [/center] [center][img]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u114/epicurus/Separator_zpse2e66368.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:7, topic:549741”][quote author=djzone link=topic=668628.msg4473502#msg4473502 date=1424463790]

lol how many times is this going to re-launch?

One? We were given permission to create a new advert because we weren’t able to update our old one. That’s why you’re seeing it a second time. I don’t understand your question though.

OT: Our fullscreen is almost finished and ready for release, along with multiple client graphical tweaks which gives you control over your gaming experience. We will also be implementing our own task system which will aid players along their journey and enable them to gain monetary rewards.
[/quote]

its just iv seen 3 different epicurus servers each by a diff person so thats why[/quote]

Weird, I’ve only seen this one

[quote=“Mr.Draconian, post:8, topic:549741”]May I ask what is this?
317,474,614,718,562?[/quote]

Yeah this is a 317. We have some higher data loaded but nothing too stupid.

Read full topic
item.source: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes

item.title: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

naseem142:

lol how many times is this going to re-launch?

One? We were given permission to create a new advert because we weren’t able to update our old one. That’s why you’re seeing it a second time. I don’t understand your question though.

OT: Our fullscreen is almost finished and ready for release, along with multiple client graphical tweaks which gives you control over your gaming experience. We will also be implementing our own task system which will aid players along their journey and enable them to gain monetary rewards.

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]
[center]Forums - www.epicurus-ps.com[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] - www.youtube.com/EpicurusPS[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] - www.twitter.com/EpicurusPS[/center]
[center] [/center]

[center]Download client - www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Webclient - www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]
[center]Download our files once, and never wait to download them again! A small one-time download is all you need to get going with Epicurus.[/center]
[center]Epicurus utilises its own patching system and class loader which means all updates are pushed straight to your computer and you are not required to re-download manually. Epicurus also offers its own updater which will make sure you have the most up-to-date version of our loader.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]

[ul][]Grand exchange
[]Fullscreen and resizable client
[]Decent banking
[]Multiple types of gambling
[]Player abilities, i.e bonds (additions to your account to enhance your character)
[]Weekly lottery
[]Party room
[]Tasks & Achievements
[]Quests
[]In-game and forum leaderboards for all types of players
[]A wide range of custom bosses with unique abilities
[]A strong combat base
[]Many bosses with unique abilities which require strategic play
[]Client pasting, screenshotting, clickable links
[]Magic bonus damage from potions and equipment working correctly
[]Defence in combat works better
[]Decent combat formula
[]Fast and reliable switching with reduced item drag
[]All skills working
[]Duo slayer
[]Full version of barrows
[]Multiple areas and islands players can visit
[]Account modes
[]Player kits; Save and load specific inventories and equipment to quickly return to your desired task
[]Custom teleports; Save your custom locations and teleport to nearly anywhere in the world!
[]Boss instances solo, or in a team
[]Improved npc AI
[]NPC prayers and prayer cycling
[]Both prayer books working, with added prayers Augury and Rigour
[]Good entity->entity following
[]Vengance orb that displays your vengeance timer
[]Advanced anti-cheat system which ensures your experience with us will be enjoyed!
[]Account Guardian, protects your account from devices that are unknown.
[]Server->Player emailing, to ensure you are kept up-to-date with the latest server and account information.[/ul]

And much more!

[center]Here at Epicurus we do not exaggerate our content in order to maximise our publicity. Many servers who advertise “flawless” this and “perfect” that cannot actually provide such things. We do not believe in these terms in order to explain rsps content as we believe there is always room for improvement no matter what. [/center]

Media:
[spoiler]

[center]Combat[/center]
[center]Switching[/center]
[center][/center]
[center]Player Bonds[/center]
[center]Bonds are items that players can trade, that are sold in the store which give your player new abilities for a certain period of time. These abilities are fully automated and are extremely easy to operate.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Duo Activities[/center]
[center]Duo slayer is a co-operative and fun way to do a slayer socially and efficiently. Both players receive points/xp and a bonus for completing a task together.[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Account modes[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Which one will you choose?[/center]
[center]Iron Man Mode:[/center]
[center]Your account is restricted to trading just like in the official Runescape game. This mode is for the most hardcore players who love to earn everything by themselves. This mode also comes with obtainable items that is specifically designed for this mode![/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Economy mode:[/center]
[center]This mode is just the most basic way of playing. You start out on a fresh account with the starter package. This mode has the ability to access areas that other modes cannot![/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Pking mode:[/center]
[center]Pking mode allows you to obtain a slight advantage over other modes so you can begin playing instantly. With the pking mode you are able to set your own stats![/center]

[center]Bossing[/center]
[center]Wilderness Beasts[/center]
[center]Wilderness beasts are powerful bosses throughout the wilderness with several attack styles. They pack a punch, carry good loot and have unique abilities. Can you defeat them?[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Titan[/center]
[center]One boss, two forms. A tough boss that requires a good setup and special equipment to kill. Do you have what it takes to defeat him?[/center]
[center]First form[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Second form[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center]When bosses are killed, analytics are shown to display the dealt damage.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Skele Trio[/center]
[center]Three extremely powerful bosses, combined as one. Three different attack styles, the ability to cycle prayers rendering your attacks useless, and an inventory of good loot! Can you defeat them?[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Ice Queen[/center]
[center]The Ice Queen is a powerful boss located in the deep wilderness with many abilities. She’s tough, uses multiple attack styles and is able to regenerate her health.[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Grand exchange[/center]
[center]A fully working grand exchange with the ability to search, sell, buy and collect from other players regardless of whether they’re offline or online.[/center]
[center]

[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Banking[/center]
[center]Full banking including item dragging, searching and item inserting.[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Player kits[/center]
[center]Players are able to save and load their custom kits. This saves time and is extremely helpful when pking or pvming.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Saving[/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Loading[/center]
[center][/center]
[center]Boss instancing[/center]
[center]Boss instances allow users to boss either solo, or as a team without interruption. Players are teleported to their own boss to which no one else can attack or have access to. All players can be managed through the interface.[/center]
[center]
[/center]
[center]Additional orbs[/center]
[center]An orb has been added under the prayer orb to display the player’s vengeance timer in real-time so you know exactly when you can re-cast your spell! More to come.

[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Pets[/center]
[center]A pet system that allows players to buy their own pets from a huge range that are available. These pets need feeding in order to grow and to be able to help you in combat! Each pet carries its own unique ability.

[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Account Guardian[/center]
[center]Epicurus utilises a custom account guardian which protects your account 99.9%. Your account will be completely secure once set and the guardian uses a range of different protection methods to ensure your account is safe, The account guardian will also notify you by email if an account breach is made, or even a low level bruteforce.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Duelling[/center]
[center]Duelling has had many fixes and additions. One of the features include loading previous selected rules. The rules of your previous stake, or favourite rule combinations are saved and players have the ability to load them on the interface to save time.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/spoiler]
[center] [/center]
[center]Download client - www.epicurus-ps.com/EpicurusLoader.zip[/center]
[center]Webclient - www.epicurus-ps.com/webclient.html[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Epicurus - 24/7 - FULLSCREEN! - Custom and unique features - Account modes
